#summary deleteOne([where,order])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelClassFunctions Model Class Functions]

*Description*:

Gets an object based on conditions and deletes it.

*Return Type*:

Boolean

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *where* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `findAll` ||
|| *order* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `findAll` ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset result = model("user").deleteOne(order="signupDate DESC")>
}}}
